name: Beat Ball
description:
Beat Ball is the first game I ever made. It's an arkanoid/breakout clone that was made to promote the music I make. It's really old so it may or may not run on your modern computer.

  •  120 levels
  •  Lot's of music

Beatball was once included on a CD that came with a German game magazine and I still get e-mails every now and then from people that grew up with the game as a child and that they used to play it all the time. I find that since I'm so young myself, ahem =) There are also a bunch of German let's play videos of Beat Ball.
